scripts.together:build: concurrently "yarn --cwd AudioSphere build" "yarn --cwd GeminiChat build" "yarn --cwd QuoteGen build"
scripts.clean: rimraf AudioSphere/node_modules AudioSphere/.mext GeminiChat/node_modules GeminiChat/.mext QuoteGen/node_modules QuoteGen/.mext
scripts.install: yarn install --force --silent --cwd AudioSphere && yarn install --force --silent --cwd GeminiChat && yarn install --force --silent --cwd QuoteGen
scripts.together:dev: concurrently "http-server . -p 3000" "yarn --cwd AudioSphere dev -p 3001" "yarn --cwd GeminiChat dev -p 3002" "yarn --cwd QuoteGen dev -p 3003"
scripts.update: cd AudioSphere && yarn run update:fix && cd .. && yarn upgrade --latest --force --silent --cwd GeminiChat && yarn upgrade --latest --force --silent --cwd QuoteGen
scripts.together:start: concurrently "http-server . -p 3000" "yarn --cwd AudioSphere start -p 3001" "yarn --cwd GeminiChat start -p 3002" "yarn --cwd QuoteGen start -p 3003"
